text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the official Iraqi press on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Turkey is keen to expand its trade with Iraq.
- Iraq and Poland are holding talks to renew oil contracts.
- Russian foreign ministry issues statement praising cooperation between Baghdad and Moscow.
(The above stories were also carried by THAWRA and IRAQ)
- Deputy Premier Tareq Aziz meets with Turkish Prime Minister and Foreign Minister.
- The United States admits that 385 Americans were killed during the 1991 Gulf War.
- Health Minister meets with Bahraini businessmen.
